ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
½ teaspoon orange extract, or more to taste
1 (8 ounce) tub frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
1 cup miniature marshmallows (such as Kraft® Jet-Puffed)

cookingTips: Don't drain pineapple; the juice helps the pudding set properly
Fold ingredients gently to keep whipped topping light and fluffy
Chill for at least 1 hour before serving for best texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This retro-inspired salad is a light, festive side. Guide the cook through proper folding technique to maintain airiness, timing of ingredient additions, and chilling for optimal flavor and texture development.
